categories.label: Input
categories.info: Controls to specify parameters of the parallel coordinates plot

input_columns.label: variables
input_columns.info: Two or more columns selected to produce the numerical summary

input_col.label: colour
input_col.info: A vector of colours, recycled as necessary for each observation.

input_lty.label: line type
input_lty.info: A vector of line types, recycled as necessary for each observation.

input_varlabel.label: axis labels
input_varlabel.info: If TRUE, each variable's axis is labelled with maximum and minimum values.
